title: [Limley's Combat Gear]
[Limley's General Store]
[Limley's Weaponry]
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the blue brocade walls, and an uneven wooden ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of an unfinished wooden floor.  There is a twisted dark metal rack on one side of the shop and an elegantly carved oak armoire on the other.
